= Extensions =

List of published extensions, with links to individual documentation pages

 * [ExtensionAmazoncouk Amazoncouk] Launch search of Amazon.co.uk using ISBN data.
 * [ExtensionAudiblecouk Audiblecouk] Launch search of audible.co.uk using author and title data.
 * [ExtensionCopac Copac] Launch search of copac.ac.uk using ISBN data.
 * [ExtensionDelicious del.icio.us] Launch a window to the del.cio.us bookmaking service.
 * [ExtensionGBS Google Book Search] Launch a window to Google Book Search book display service.
 * [ExtensionGBSEmbed Google Book Search Embedded Viewer] Embed Google Book Search Viewer in page.
 * [ExtensionGas Google Analytics] Simply add the code for Google Analytics to a page.
 * [ExtensionGoogleMap Google Map] Insert a Google Map in to a page.
 * [ExtensionGoogleRssFeed Google RSS Feed] Insert a Google [http://www.google.com/uds/solutions/dynamicfeed/index.html Dynamic Feed Control] in to a page.
 * [ExtensionSimpleInsert Simple Insert] Simple Juice insert in to a page.
 * [ExtensionLibraryThing LibraryThing] Launch search of librarything.com using title data.
 * [ExtensionOpenLibrary OpenLibrary] Launch search of openlibrary.org using ISBN data.
